lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: it is the only practical thing I have found that I can do that might make a difference

lender.name: Angelo
lender.loan_because: My purpose in life is to bring out the eternal beauty in myself and others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people increase the vitality of their body, mind, and spirit.

lender.name: Nana yaw
lender.loan_because: I love to see lives change!

lender.name: Merle & Georgina
lender.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Merle builds homes. Georgina works for Canada's national blood donation & collection agency.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: A friend gave this to me as a Xmas gift and as of today 02 Jan 08 I have begun the process. I intend on reinvesting the loaned money within KIVA and giving more money as my funds will permit. I lend because I feel this is just a small token I can do for someone else to help them. I know that sometimes all it takes is one person to improve or change a life and I would like to be that person for someone. I believe in the "Pay it forward" concept.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a logistician for one of the biggest organizations in the world.

lender.name: Curtis
lender.loan_because: Kevin (11) and Manato (7) are learning about what happens with money.
lender.occupational_info: Retired stuntman and now father

lender.name: Begum
lender.loan_because: If some of us are lucky enough to stand on our feet we need to return that favor by helping people to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I sell products for a software company.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: I like to support people with bright ideas.

lender.name: Webwings
lender.loan_because: If all entrepreneurs helped others in business to succeed, we would make life better for so many people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: We help companies build successful businesses on the internet.

lender.name: jerome
lender.loan_because: the concept is promising!

lender.name: Josiah
lender.loan_because: why not?

lender.name: Kaho
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help change this world for the better. lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: It is a blessing to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help deliver babies in the Operating room.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime. -Chinese Proverb
lender.occupational_info: Great Point is a global social investment fund my family and I started for particpation in microloan programs. As our tagline says, we strive to be a "beacon of hope for small businesses, worldwide" (SM)

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I believe that we all have a responsibility to help our fellow human beings and this is such a uniquely personal way to be reminded of the incredible impact that giving can have.

lender.occupational_info: i working to efficiently my job , differnt job are done , i have job, sale consultant,traniner,accountant

lender.name: Claude
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate to live in a country with many opportunities. I would like to do my small part in helping someone in another country get an opportunity to prosper.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: billions of people around the world need a little bit of help to build a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: see my website.

lender.name: Helen Tilston

lender.occupational_info: A landscape painter who paints en plein aire

lender.name: Valentina (Germany)

lender.name: Alissa
lender.loan_because: I can make a real difference in people's lives.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: this is how the world can change for the better....one person at a time!

lender.name: Deb, Laurie and Jessica
lender.loan_because: By providing microloans, we can give others access to resources to improve their lives and share their prosperity within their community. We loan with Kiva because it gives us the opportunity to reach out to others across the world and join together with them to improve our global community.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: If I can help people become self-sufficient, productive members of their community and happier in their lives than we as a people are making progress in our common future.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Craftsman of fine and unique Coin Rings and market my Jewellry on Etsy.com.

lender.name: Gabriella
lender.loan_because: we all have to work together for the greater good. Giving a determined person a chance at a better life by providing them the tools they need benefits not just them, but so many others as well. It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I own a sales & marketing company that focuses on travel accounts, so I get to see a lot of the world and so many areas where people need help. In addition however, I also run a charity initiative that benefits both fair-trade workers and South African orphans in need which has become such an amazing part of my life. www.indabaworldwide.com

lender.name: xWin
lender.loan_because: We want to help people achieve their full potential
lender.occupational_info: Sports Trading

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with a healthy family of 8 chidlren and many opportunities. I have been raised with the teaching to share whatever we have been given. Life is a good gift and its great to be part of a global community

lender.name: Ian & Erica
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Jun B.
lender.loan_because: Sharing your blessings and helping will change the life of other people.

lender.name: Margaret

lender.name: Luisa
lender.loan_because: I love to be of service to the world!

lender.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place for children like my grandson (pictured).
lender.occupational_info: I am a long time worker in information technology and I help design and build computer systems and networks.

lender.name: Frahm
lender.occupational_info: Our family works with low income elderly and IT services for State Government.

lender.name: Herve
lender.loan_because: The money provides immediate help to someone who is enterprising but in need. It also makes me feel good to be able to contribute in this way.
lender.occupational_info: I work at an educational institution. Students who have complaints about any aspect of their student life can come to my office for help.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: to give is a privilege.
lender.occupational_info: I study antibiotic resistant bacteria that transmit between people and animals.

lender.name: Gabriele
lender.loan_because: I think this is one of the most extraordinary organizations I ever ran into that helps funding real people with real needs. Good luck to all the small business in the world!
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time Architect in Residential housing, and I also get to build my own projects when feasable.

lender.name: Corrie
lender.loan_because: It's all about creating jobs....
lender.occupational_info: I work for IFC - an international organization investing in companies in developing countries.

lender.loan_because: Progress happens when we help each other in some direct, tangible way.
lender.occupational_info: I am starting a bakery from scratch.

lender.name: Ginger & Andrew
lender.loan_because: We were able to start a biofuel business in NH called Simply Green this year thanks to a loan from a friend so we want to pay it forward and make difference for others whom are eager to work hard and start a business of their own.
lender.occupational_info: Biofuel is soy based oil to fuel cars, homes, and businesses. Its a great product to use in order to help the environment and decrease emmisions.

lender.loan_because: it could change lives for the better

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: even a small difference is a difference!

lender.name: Tom

lender.occupational_info: I'm an engineer.

lender.occupational_info: I know world is very short now by way of internet so that I try my efforts.

lender.name: Glenn
lender.loan_because: I want to be a force for good in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Ministry

lender.occupational_info: I have a computer service company, i repair computers, build webpages, supervise computer networks from some companies, and other comuter tech stuff :)

lender.name: Bergman family
lender.loan_because: Helping others is what we are called to do.

lender.loan_because: I hope that it helps someone have a better life, everyone deserves it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mom to a one year old.

lender.loan_because: It's the right thing for me to do.

lender.name: Renan
lender.loan_because: I am a father of two children and currently needing to re-start my business. Due to the loss of the only one account I had, my family currently is surviving by a loan I got two months ago - loan which is ending. Once I am able to travel again and feed my family, I will be able to be back in business. I need to loan US$ 2,500.00
lender.occupational_info: I am an export agent, selling leathers made in Brazil to several countries in the world. lender.loan_because: There is a need.

lender.name: howard and maureen
lender.loan_because: Because it's a perfect example of what capitalism could be if more average Joes could get involved.

lender.occupational_info: I am a religion major currently, making my way through college.

lender.name: Gary

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: it is good to help others.

lender.name: Deer Valley Lodging
lender.loan_because: We, at Deer Valley Lodging group Sales have decided to donate money for good cause instead of doing exchange gifts for our Christmas party. We figured that we don't really need any thing so it would be much better to use the money by helping people in need. Kiva gave us the opportunity to share our blessings to the rest of the world.
lender.occupational_info: We book groups (conferences, conventions, trainings, seminars) in our hotel properties here in Park City, UT.

lender.loan_because:

lender.name: Polly
lender.loan_because: Pay it forward.

lender.occupational_info: For the company I work for , I take care of reminding clients that they forgot to pay their bills and help them make the arrangements to make sure they pay on time.

lender.loan_because: Everybody needs a change.
lender.occupational_info: I give support to business on events, communication and business support.

lender.occupational_info: I am self employeed.

lender.name: Stacie
lender.loan_because: What a great feeling to help out a complete stranger. My dad got me started with a Kiva gift certificate for Christmas, and I'm so glad he did!

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: To make a difference in the lives of people. It isn't how long you live on this earth that makes a difference. It is the difference you make on this earth with the time you are given to live.

lender.name: Mehul
lender.loan_because: it will help someone else survive and emerge as a stronger human being
lender.occupational_info: No matter where you are, everyday comes with its unique challenges. Those who face them with "indomitable will", will SURVIVE. Thats what I do every single day, face my challenges with a smile on my face and determination in my mind.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.occupation: Part time Documentary Film Maker---Full Time Lover

lender.name: Dr. Roshan
lender.loan_because: I know my parents came from over from India with little or no money and then raised themselves up to create a better life for their children and I feel that I am very fortunate to be raised the way that I was. I want to transcend those values through loaning money to those who have their eyes set up creating a better life for themselves along with the next generation. And for that, I loan.

lender.name: Heather
lender.occupation: Director of Finance and Human Resources
lender.loan_because: "What we have done for ourselves alone dies with us; what we have done for others and the world remains and is immortal. Albert Pike

lender.name: Mattie
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together -
lender.occupational_info: I teach reading to children ages 5-8.

lender.name: Jill/John/Matt/Zac

Through making music, one can transcend the typical obstacles found with communicative disorders, and bring about a sense of well-being. Zachary and Matthew are students in the local school, studying math, literature, science, art, music and geography. They enjoy making music, playing soccer and laughing together.

lender.loan_because: I believe in giving. Many have given to me, I feel blessed to give in return!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a very busy hospital, in the emergency department.

lender.occupational_info: I use a reading intervention system to improve the abilities of low-level readers at the Durango Adult Education Center

lender.name: Tiffany & Jeff
lender.loan_because: My Husband and I loan because this is a great tool to improve conditions in the rest of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am in sales for a Lonza. A contract manufacturer to the Pharmaceutical/Biotech industry

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I started my own business and everyone needs help starting a business.
lender.occupational_info: I help small businesses improve their cash flow.

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: I'd like to give others a shot at achieving their goals
lender.occupational_info: I help manage projects for a large company

lender.name: Juli
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Kevin Hewitt
lender.loan_because: I have been very lucky to have people who care about me and I want to share that experience with others.
lender.occupational_info: I take pictures .... now smile!

lender.name: Nimali, Noella, Chris
lender.loan_because: We received a Kiva gift certificate from Nimali's sister for Christmas and we enjoyed learning about your businesses.
lender.occupational_info: Nimali is a lawyer. Chris is a musician. And Noella is a grade four student and a writer!

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: We are all connected! Although I live within modest means by American standards, I feel fortunate to be able to assist in support ing others to define and reach their full potential.
lender.occupational_info: I am also a new entrepreneur; providing full service travel arrangements to individuals and businesses in underserved communities.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I believe in the principle of helping others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses run better, faster and more profitably by improving their computer software.

lender.name: Connor, Isaac, Eliza
lender.loan_because: We are nuts about our Grammy!!! We wanted to give a gift in our Grammy's name (Sharon) to help this woman with her business.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I use a computer to design machinery for steel plants and the transportation industries.

lender.name: Karma and Brad
lender.loan_because: We loan because we are a small part of a larger global community. We believe that it is our role as a community member is to share what we have. Not only does that help individuals, but strengthen the community as a whole and foster good will among all of us.
lender.occupational_info: Karma= Emergency Manager. Plans for, prevents, reponds to, and helps her community recover from disasters and large emergencies. Brad= Construction. Builds and repairs fuel and auto repair stations.

lender.name: Chase
lender.loan_because: every one needs help at one point in time I loan to people hoping that some day they will loan to another person for a continuous circle of help
lender.occupational_info: its usauly a bad day at the office.More 9-5

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: It is so very exciting to be a part of someone's dream. Thank you Kiva for the opportunities and all you do!

lender.name: Ebon
lender.loan_because: I should.
lender.occupational_info: I study fine art photography at RMIT university. My photographs can be viewed at my website.

lender.name: Blake
lender.loan_because: I know what it feels like to work for years and feel like you will never get ahead. If I can help someone out, I feel very fortunate.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people who have a realistic plan and need a loan to make the plan work.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and live on a sailboat. I used to be a lawyer and a partner in small real estate projects.

lender.name: Nash
lender.loan_because: as an engineering student who's a year behind in his schooling, I don't have time to make the world a better place any other way!
lender.occupational_info: I'm going to school to become an electrical engineer. I'm hoping to get a job in the audio electronics industry after I graduate. I love music, so I want to find new ways to bring it to people everywhere!

lender.name: Natalia
lender.loan_because: It feels good to give back.

lender.name: Syrenitee
lender.loan_because: I loan because I care. I also loan because I want to change lives!!!
lender.occupational_info: I climbed Whiteface Mountain in Lake Placid all the way to the top and all the way down!

lender.name: Linda
lender.occupational_info: I take care of business's by keeping track of how they spend their money

lender.name: Ekstrom Family
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping others; we believe in the power of microloans. Everyone deserves the chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Hanna provides in-home medical care for dogs and cats in the Greater Seattle Area. Hakan is an international forestry consultant.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: I first heard about this program in a college business class and am happy to now be a part of it. I think it is a great way to help those who just need a little assistance to support their families and contribute to their communities.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I feel I can make such a big difference to another, with such a small gift.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find a way forward for their business, supporting their business and communication planning.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.occupation: quality assurance for social welfare programs
lender.loan_because: It helps me remember we all live on the same planet
lender.occupational_info: I review food stamps, medicaid and cash assistance progams for accuracy.

lender.name: Seal Pool
lender.loan_because: I don't believe in the free market.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: It feels good to know that I can make a small contribution to helping people to realise their dreams

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: It amazes me that the same entrepreneurial spirit lives around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Its a people business, much like many others.

lender.name: Lesley
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: mary anne
lender.loan_because: The need is so great and it expands my little world.

lender.name: Vincent
lender.occupational_info: I go to UCSB and I play poker on the internet.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Micro-lending provides unbanked entrepreneurs with much more than a simple, one-time influx of cash; it helps them build a reputation and, over time, wealth for themselves, their families and their communities.

lender.name: bahman
lender.loan_because: everyone should pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I design tall buildings.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I'd like to share some of my good fortune with those striving for a better life.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I think that microlending is incredible. I read Yunus' book "Banker to the Poor" and it changed my thinking regarding the poor. My ultimate plan is to move to Kenya and work through a microlending institution there.
lender.occupational_info: I am a bank branch manager.

lender.name: Aileen
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Ingrid
lender.occupational_info: I am pursuing a PhD in Neuroscience. I study the brain and the diseases of the brain. My work primarily focuses on finding ways to treat Epilepsy

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: This is a small, easily do-able, direct way of sharing my resources to help someone else build her own life up. It's easy, low-risk, and is helping someone to fish, rather than tossing a pre-made meal her way.
lender.occupational_info: Mostly I raise my five kids. Occasionally I write, and even more occasionally, I get paid for what I write.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: eveyone needs help sometime

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I think it's a genius concept. I love to support people who are following their dreams. And since it's a loan, it's like recycling money!
lender.occupational_info: Most of the time, I write advertising copy for marketing campaigns. I'm also a part-time photographer with a few scattered shows around Cincinnati.
